alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 1:35AM PST until March 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * CHANGES...Issued Winter Weather Advisory. * WHAT...Gusty winds and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, except for 5 to 10 inches across western Mineral and far southern Lyon counties. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong west winds will arrive first with moderate to heavy snow developing later in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
